name: Rainbow Runner (itch)
description:
Rainbow Runner is a psychedelic first-person platformer. Taking place in the City of Panchromia, the game tells the tale of the systematic oppression of a disparate group of species by the city's ruling regime.

You are an observer of unknown origin. You witness police brutality and become a fugitive from the dreaded Rainbow Police. Flee through the shining city by running and jumping on the Brightways of Panchromia. Escape without falling to your death, and one day you might get a chance to strike back at the Rainbow Police.Mouse - Look | Arrow Keys - Run | Space - Jump

parallaxvisions.com
